query:
SELECT 
                    u.id as user_id,
                    u.full_name,
                    u.city,
                    u.country,
                    us.total_points,
                    us.total_clears as "reports_cleared!",
                    us.current_streak,
                    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY us.total_points DESC) as "rank!"
                FROM users u
                INNER JOIN user_scores us ON u.id = us.user_id
                WHERE u.city = $1 AND us.total_clears > 0
                ORDER BY us.total_points DESC
                LIMIT 20
